short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI reshapes bookmark management and new tab page experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI reshapes bookmark management and new tab page experience. 
https://github.com/lwxyfer/Linker open source.

Features
- Replace your newTab page with bookmarks
- Support adding tags and descriptions when saving bookmarks
- Support two-way synchronization of bookmarks and Chrome bookmarks modifications
- Support fast search bookmarks

How to Use:
Simply install the extension to start using it immediately.
When you bookmark a page, the extension will prompt you to add tags and descriptions.
Choose from suggested tags, create your own, or skip this step.
Include a description for each bookmark to capture your thoughts or important details.
Open a new tab to access your bookmark list directly, making it a part of your daily browsing routine.

Privacy & Security:
We respect your privacy. This extension operates entirely on your device, ensuring that no data is uploaded or shared.
